data.name: TensorGrad
content: TensorGrad is a {{high-performance C++ library}} for tensor operations with {{automatic gradient computation}} support, designed for machine learning applications.

The library features comprehensive {{tensor operations}} including matrix multiplication, element-wise operations, and activation functions, with full {{automatic differentiation}} capabilities for training neural networks.

data.name: Copilot-for-Linux
content: Copilot-for-Linux is a solution to {{search across all PDF files}} on a system using {{word embeddings}} for summarization. By leveraging the power of Word2Vec, the project can find and return relevant documents based on user queries.
The project uses {{ChromaDB}} for efficient vector storage and retrieval, making it possible to find semantically similar content even when exact keywords aren't present in the documents.

data.name: SHI
content: SHI is a {{deep fake detection}} system using AI/ML techniques to identify face-swap based deep fake videos. This project was developed for the Smart India Hackathon 2024.

The system combines {{multiple detection approaches}} including lip forgery detection and face anomaly detection to create a comprehensive and robust deepfake detection framework that can adapt to evolving deepfake methods.

data.name: Piano-Roll-Generation
content: Piano-Roll-Generation is a project for {{generating piano music}} using transformer-based models. The system can create original piano compositions by learning patterns from MIDI files.
The project implements a {{bigram model}} with transformer architecture to understand and generate musical sequences, demonstrating the application of NLP techniques to music generation.

data.name: 2D-game-engine
content: This project is a {{custom 2D game engine}} built from scratch in C++. It was developed to understand the inner workings of game engines and graphics programming.
The engine includes components for {{rendering}}, {{physics}}, and {{input handling}}, providing a foundation for creating 2D games with modern graphics capabilities.

data.name: Chess
content: A {{chess game implementation}} with AI capabilities using Python and Pygame. The project features a complete chess ruleset with all standard moves and special rules.
The AI opponent uses {{Monte Carlo Tree Search}} algorithms to evaluate positions and determine the best moves, providing a challenging gameplay experience.

data.name: Computer Vision
content: This repository contains implementations of {{fundamental computer vision algorithms}} and techniques, exploring the mathematical foundations of image processing.
The project includes implementations of {{corner detection}}, {{edge detection}}, {{Fourier transforms}}, and {{SIFT features}}, providing practical examples of computer vision concepts.

data.name: MANGA_GEN
content: MANGA_GEN is an {{advanced AI system}} that implements an {{agentic framework}} using {{LangGraph}} to create complete manga stories from initial ideas.

The system first {{writes and reviews stories}} based on input concepts using {{NLP techniques}}, then uses a {{custom fine-tuned image generation model}} built with {{PyTorch}} and {{Hugging Face}} libraries to create the visual components of the manga.

data.name: browser-use
content: browser-use is a {{Python utility}} for {{browser automation}} and web interaction, making it easier to perform repetitive tasks and data collection from websites.
The project provides a simplified interface for common browser operations, enabling efficient web scraping and automated testing.

data.name: HealthBud
content: HealthBud is an {{interactive health platform}} that uses a {{questionnaire-based approach}} to identify potential disease behaviors and health concerns in users.
The platform {{connects users}} with similar health profiles to {{like-minded communities}}, facilitating information sharing and support among individuals with similar health conditions or concerns.

data.name: Guj_eng
content: Guj_eng is an {{innovative translation system}} that directly converts {{English text in images to Gujarati}} without requiring an intermediate OCR step.
The model was {{trained from scratch}} on the AI4Bharat dataset, enabling efficient and accurate translation of visual text content between these languages.
